category.title: osu! skin
category.description: Includes osu! and an extra gamemode of your choice.

clause.content: If not chosen, additional gamemode will default to osu!taiko

category.title: Additional gameplay variant
category.description: I'll make a variant of the skin for a specific playstyle (DT, HD, etc).

category.title: Make your skin private
category.description: Having a private skin means I'll only share it with you and won't be published anywhere.

clause.content: Pictures / screenshots can still be published to this website as a showcase

category.title: Tournament Skin
category.description: Gameplay Only Skin for tournament streaming.

category.title: Animated Tournament Backgrounds
category.description: Animated backgrounds for the tourney client.

category.title: All Tournament Designs
category.description: Includes banners, all animated tourney backgrounds, and the skin.

category.title: Profile Banner
category.description: Includes various Aspect Ratios so it can be used on other platforms.

category.title: Basic Stream Overlay
category.description: Includes 3 OBS Scenes, Basic Chat and Alerts, And no Transitions.

category.title: Advanced Stream Overlay
category.description: Includes 4 OBS Scenes, Custom Chat and Alerts, And basic Transitions.

category.title: Pro Stream Overlay
category.description: Includes 6 OBS Scenes, Custom Chat and Alerts, And Detailed Transitions.

category.title: Webpage Design
category.description: I'll design you a webpage, just like this one.

category.title: Full Website Design
category.description: I'll design your entire website or app.
